name: plantlight
description:
Collect the pulsing dots. Click to grow the plant, and use the fly to scout out ahead.

press space to switch between the fly and the squirrel (plant climber.)

fly controls: arrow keys (up, left, right)

squirrel controls: arrow keys (left, right)

you can also press J at any time to transfer to a bigger level

don't press any other keys!

when you've got them all, be ready to get back down without being hit!

Made for LOWREZJAM2022. All art and sound by me!
